amendment.description: Amendment provides for increasing the minimum wage by $1 over a 2-year period.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 106-516 to provide for the increase in the minimum wage to occur over a 2-year period as opposed to a 3-year period as provided in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 246 - 179 (Roll no. 43).
